description: The latest video from the Dungeons & Dragons YouTube channel introduces the inclusion of Greyhawk in the upcoming 2024 Dungeon Master’s Guide. As the first campaign setting ever published for D&D, Greyhawk is set to play a central role in the new guide, coinciding with the game’s 50th anniversary. The development team explains their decision...
title: Greyhawk Returns in 2024 Dungeon Master’s Guide for D&D’s 50th Anniversary

description: Archon Studio has announced the upcoming release of Master of Orion: Ad Astra, a 4X strategy board game based on the well-known Master of Orion PC series. The game is set to offer players the chance to control one of six races as they explore space, colonize planets, and develop technologies in pursuit of galactic...
title: Archon Studio Announces Master of Orion: Ad Astra Board Game Based on the Iconic Game Master of Orion

description: Renegade Game Studios has opened pre-orders for Wraith & The Giants, a solitaire game where players face off against elemental giants. In the game, the responsibility of defending a village from these giants falls to the player after the death of their character’s grandmother, who had previously taken on the role. The game features four...
title: Renegade Game Studios Announces Pre-Orders for Wraith & The Giants

description: Indie Boards and Cards, the publisher behind games like Coup, Resistance, and Avalon, has launched The Magnus Protocol Mysteries on Backerkit. The game is based on the Magnus Protocol podcast, a stand-alone sequel to the award-winning Magnus Archives series by Rusty Quill. Players step into the role of employees at the Office of Incident Assessment...
title: Indie Boards and Cards Releases The Magnus Protocol Mysteries on Backerkit

description: Chaosium has confirmed that the ElfQuest RPG 40th anniversary reissue will launch on Kickstarter on October 29th. This new Deluxe 2″ boxed set will include all the original material from the game’s 1984 release, along with supplements. The ElfQuest RPG, based on the popular comic series by Wendy and Richard Pini, was first published in...
title: ElfQuest RPG 40th Anniversary Reissue Kickstarter Date Set for October 29th

description: Royal Blood is a tabletop roleplaying game that blends tarot cards, heists, magic, and high-stakes challenges. Players take on the roles of Royals, modern-day magicians descended from ancient sorcerers, each represented by a court card in a tarot deck. These characters are tasked with pulling off daring heists to steal power from the Arcane—former humans...
title: Royal Blood: A Tarot-Based Heist RPG Focused on Magic and Fate – On Kickstarter Now
